means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 惠特职业名称，小麦种植者或销售者，来源于古英语，含义是“小麦”(wheat)

word_mean: 小麦：植物Triticum vulgare及其麦粒。麦粒为一种能源，而且是一种生物学价值低于动物蛋白的蛋白质来源
麦麸和麦粒胚芽中含铁、磷及复合维生素B，过度碾磨会去除这些物质

sentence.Network_en: The aphid is now laying waste to the wheat and barley fields.
sentence.Network_cn: 蚜虫正在毁掉一片片的小麦和大麦田地。

sentence.Network_en: It would pay farmers to plough up the scrub and plant wheat.
sentence.Network_cn: 它会出钱雇农民开垦这块低矮丛林来种植麦子。

sentence.Network_en: I take wheat and yeast tablets daily to purify the blood.
sentence.Network_cn: 我每天服用干酵母片以净化血液。

phrase.cizu_name: separate the wheat from the chaff

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hwǣte of Germanic origin; related to Dutch weit, German Weizen, also to white

entry.def: Wheat is a cereal crop grown for food. Wheat is also used to refer to the grain of this crop, which is usually ground into flour and used to make bread.

example.ex: ...farmers growing wheat, corn, or other crops.
example.tran: 种植小麦，玉米或其他农作物的农民。

means.word_mean: 1. annual or biennial grass having erect flower spikes and light brown grains
2. grains of common wheat; sometimes cooked whole or cracked as cereal; usually ground into flour

sentences.en: The farmer grows a lot of wheat.
sentences.cn: 这位农民种了许多小麦。

jushi.english: The farmer grows a lot of wheat.
jushi.chinese: 这位农民种了许多小麦。

jushi.english: When wheat is ripe, we would go there to help cutting in.
jushi.chinese: 麦子熟了的时候,我们会去那里帮助收割。

jushi.english: We expect a good crop of wheat.
jushi.chinese: 我们期待着小麦获得大丰收。
